news_header: Israeli forces arrested thousands of suspected Hamas fighters in northern Gaza, including 44 staff members from Kamal Adwan hospital.
news_text: During the weekend, Israeli forces arrested thousands of suspected Hamas fighters in northern Gaza, specifically targeting Kamal Adwan hospital where 44 male staff members were detained. The World Health Organization reported that the hospital has suffered significant damage due to ongoing conflict, and Israeli forces have conducted multiple raids on hospitals in Gaza over the past year, citing concerns that Hamas may be using medical facilities for military purposes.
